sentences.en: An indefinite alteration had come over his whole person and manner.
sentences.cn: 他整个的人和态度已经有了一种说不出的变化.

sentences.en: An indefinite number of people read Shakespeare.
sentences.cn: 无数的人念过莎士比亚的作品.

sentences.en: He gave me a very indefinite answer.
sentences.cn: 他给我十分含糊的回答.

sentences.en: He gave me an indefinite answer, ie neither ` yes'nor ` no '.
sentences.cn: 他给我的答覆 模棱两可.

sentences.en: He was transferred to Shoal Creek Mental Institution for an indefinite period.
sentences.cn: 他被转到了肖尔溪精神病院，要在那里无限期地呆下去。

sentences.en: His thoughts, ambiguous and indefinite, troubled him.
sentences.cn: 他心里的想法含含混混,理不清楚, 使他苦恼.

sentences.en: I began to walk about the room, examining various indefinite objects in the half darkness.
sentences.cn: 我开始在屋子里随便走走, 在半明半暗的光线中看看各种各样模糊不清的摆饰.

sentences.en: Teachers find the report’s terminology so indefinite that it is confusing.
sentences.cn: 老师们发现报告的专门用语含义不明确，令人费解。

sentences.en: The direct action of changed conditions leads to definite or indefinite results.
sentences.cn: 改变了的条件的直接作用,产生一定的或不定的结果.

sentences.en: The indefinite integral is an antiderivative.
The next day the union voted to begin an indefinite strike.
sentences.cn: 第二天工会投票表决决定开始无限期罢工。

sentences.en: The picture has been loaned for an indefinite period to the National Gallery.
sentences.cn: 那幅画长期出借给国家美术馆。

sentences.en: The store will be closed for an indefinite period.
sentences.cn: 这家商店将无限期关闭.

sentences.en: The structure has an indefinite life.
sentences.cn: 这是一座永久性的建筑物.

sentences.en: The trial was adjourned for an indefinite period.
There was an indefinite prolongation of the peace talks.
sentences.cn: 和平会谈被无限期地延长了.

sentences.en: Why must we make this statement indefinite?
sentences.cn: 我们的这个论点为什么必须是不确定的?

words.tran_cn: 难下定义的；难确定的；模糊不清的
不确定地，无限期地；模糊地，不明确地
难下定义的事物；难以确切描述的事物

trans.tran_cn: 无限期的，无限期的，不明确的，模糊的，模糊的，[语]不定的
